description: Students continue their grammar, oral, and written work with an emphasis on conversation and reading selections from classical and contemporary Russian authors. Offered annually in the spring semester. Counts toward management studies concentration. Prerequisite: RUSSN 231 or equivalent.
name: Intermed Russian II
notes: Students in Russian 232 must also register for Russian 232 L.
